DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effectiveness safety duloxetine participant fibromyalgia .
DOC.criteria: Participants fulfil follow criterion American College Rheumatology 1990 Criteria Classification Fibromyalgia Participants pain rat severity 4 Brief Pain Inventory ( BPI ) average pain severity item ( Question 3 ) Participants serious cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , hematological disease , clinically significant laboratory electrocardiogram abnormality indicate serious medical problem require significant intervention judgment investigator Participants alanine aminotransferase/aspartate aminotransferase le 100 international unit per liter ( IU/L ) total bilirubin le 1.6 milligram per deciliter ( mg/dL ) Participants serum creatinine level less 2.0 mg/dL , participant undergone kidney transplantation hemodialysis Participants pain difficult discriminate pain associate fibromyalgia disease disturb assessment Participants treatmentrefractory fibromyalgia Participants thyroidal dysfunction , exclude assess investigator disorder control appropriate 3month long drug therapy Participants present past history rheumatoid arthritis , inflammatory arthritis , infectious arthritis , auto immune disease rather thyroid deficiency Participants axis I condition accord Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders Fourth Edition ( DSMIV ) , currently within past year , except major depressive disorder Participants lifetime diagnosis bipolar disorder schizoaffective disorder ; disorder psychotic symptom base clinical opinion investigator Participants personality disorder mental retardation Participants uncontrolled angle closure glaucoma Participants present past history uncontrolled seizure convulsion disorder Participants suicidal ideation within past 6 month , suicidal attempt within past 1 year Participants answer `` yes '' question active suicidal ideation/intent/behaviors occur within past 6 month ( Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale , Suicide Ideation section Questions 4 5 ;
